resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76120</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76120</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>c67adee3-0275-11d8-89de-f357c0d2fb35#1#12</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A forradalmak szelleme</string>
            <string language="en">The spirit of the revolutions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Geist der Umdrehungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'esprit des révolutions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O espírito das voltas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo spirito dei giri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πνεύμα των επαναστάσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El alcohol de las revoluciones</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az első forradalmi hullám és általában az 1820-as évek eseményei Európában, Dél-Amerikában és Magyarországon</string>
            <string language="en">The first revolutionary wave and usually the events in the 1820 in Europe, South-America and in Hungary</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Szent Szövetség,  Simon Bolivar,  carbonari,  Byron,  Török Birodalom,  liberalizmus,  függetlenség,  </string>
            <string language="en">Saint Fellowship, Simon Bolivar, carbbonari, Byron, Turkish Empire, liberalism, independence</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die erste revolutionäre Welle und normalerweise 
die Fälle 1820 in Europa, Süden-Amerika und in Ungarn</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La première vague révolutionnaire et 
habituellement les événements dans le 1820 en Europe, 
sud-america et en Hongrie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A primeira onda revolucionária e geralmente os 
eventos no 1820 em Europa, Sul-América e em Hungria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La prima onda rivoluzionaria e solitamente gli 
eventi nel 1820 in Europa, Sud-America ed in Ungheria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πρώτο επαναστατικό κύμα και συνήθως τα γεγονότα 
στα 1820 στην Ευρώπη, Νότια Αμερική και στην Ουγγαρία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La primera onda revolucionaria y generalmente los
acontecimientos en el 1820 en Europa, Sur-Ame'rica y en Hungría</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heiliger Stipendium, Simon Bolivar, carbbonari, Byron, 
türkisches Reich, Liberalismus, Unabhängigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Camaraderie de Saint, Simon Bolivar, carbbonari, 
Byron, empire turc, libéralisme, l'indépendance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fellowship de Saint, Simon Bolivar, carbbonari, Byron, 
império turkish, liberalism, independência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fellowship del San, Simon Bolivar, carbbonari, Byron, 
impero turco, liberalism, indipendenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υποτροφία Αγίου, simon Bolivar, carbbonari, Byron,
τουρκική αυτοκρατορία, φιλελευθερισμός, ανεξαρτησία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Beca de Santo, Simon Bolivar, carbbonari, Byron, 
imperio turco, liberalismo, independencia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">16-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76120</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=c67adee3-0275-11d8-89de-f357c0d2fb35&v=1&b=12</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
